## API Migration Requirements

CRITICAL DISCOVERY: We need to migrate from the current wolfis.ae catalog API:

API Endpoint: https://services.mybcapps.com/bc-sf-filter/filter?shop=wolfi-ae.myshopify.com&page=1&limit=30&sort=manual&display=grid&collection_scope=281610289213&product_available=false&variant_available=false&build_filter_tree=true&locale=en&callback=BoostPFSFilterCallback&event_type=filter

Technical specifications:
- BoostCommerce Filter system (Shopify app)
- JSONP callback format: BoostPFSFilterCallback()
- Rich product data structure with variants, images, pricing
- Advanced filtering system with 15+ filter types (size, color, price, material, speed, etc.)
- Collection-based categorization
- Supports pagination, sorting, availability filtering
- Currency: AED (Arab Emirates Dirham)
- Products include detailed specs, descriptions, media arrays
- Filter tree structure for hierarchical browsing

Implementation considerations:
1. Analyze the existing data structure to ensure feature parity
2. Design equivalent filtering capabilities in our Next.js architecture
3. Ensure the new system supports all current filter types
4. Implement hierarchical browsing through filter tree structures
5. Account for currency handling (AED)
6. Maintain support for rich product data including variants and specifications
</info added on 2025-06-18T08:23:30.097Z>
